name: Padman
description:
The objective of the game is to eat the ghost by running past it using the arrow keys. As you collect more ghosts  you gain more points.

You start the game with three lives and as the game proceeds you can collect more lives by moving past the hearts, but you can also lose lives by running into the enemy. The enemy are the bombs and the spiders.

You can also come across rewards, such as the coins for more points, the shield to protect yourself from getting hit, and the cleaner to wipe out all the enemies.
